subs.text: Having our business mail forwarded to a scanning service hasn‚Äôt worked out. The scanning service is just fine, just the forwarding by the post is unreliable. We‚Äôll bring the mail to the service ourselves from now on.
subs.rawText: Having our business mail forwarded to a scanning service hasn‚Äôt worked out. The scanning service is just fine, just the forwarding by the post is unreliable. We‚Äôll bring the mail to the service ourselves from now on.

subs.text: The neighbors are on vacation, so their cat hangs out with us. They have a cat door, so she can go in and out from their house as she pleases. We, of course, don‚Äôt have a cat door, so she just meowed at 6 am on our patio to be let in.

subs.text: Our business accountant finished up 2021 earlier than usual, so I can send my numbers to my US tax preparer now instead of late September. No US tax again this year, just a fee for the preparer. üòÉ
